EmailTemplate.description: PO received when CS Not available to Process it
EmailTemplate.name: AMR_PO Received when CS Not Available
EmailTemplate.subject: Illumina Order Acknowledgment: PO #
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View My Account
Hello,
Thank you for your order. Your purchase order was received outside of our regular Customer Service business hours. We will process your order as soon as possible.
Purchase orders submitted via email are typically processed in 24-48 hours. To minimize future delays in processing your order, you can place orders immediately online 24/7 and view real-time order status updates using your MyIllumina account.
Your MyIllumina online account allows you to also conveniently:
Add products to your cart or redeem a quote Create scheduled shipments Favorite products to save for easy re-ordering Checkout online, track order status, and print invoices Share your cart with your colleagues or purchasing agent Download latest product catalog with your pricing
Thank you for your continued business.
Illumina Customer Support Team North America: 800.809.4566, Ext 2 Outside: 858.202.4566 www.illumina.com
Need a MyIllumina account? Register today in less than 30 seconds Â»
